item.title: Red vs Blue: Thoughts
item.description: How do we try to reimagine the next generation of our economy. Historical context Some of us are looking to the past and seeing the elements of Marx and Hegel to be the the reimagined shining light, the “heaven on earth” . And the question we have to seriously need to consider is the historical dictatorships of Communist Russia and the 3rd Reich and now we have moved over to a new era where we have removed some of the Single Entity Economic model bringing on some of the free market economics
